comments.body:
If you want to add this library in the repo, you need to mention its provenance in LICENSE at the top of the project. Take a look at the entry for CloudPickle there.

Also, is this a replacement for CloudPickle overall? I see a bunch of stuff in it for functions.
It's also not 100% clear to me that this will always work where the old PickleSerializer worked. Do you have a way to test it? If not, do we really need this for SQL?
